title: How to Get onto the Slither.io Leaderboard

steps.headline: Move towards the middle.
steps.description: Most of the snakes with higher scores will be found there. The map on the lower right of the screen will help guide you there.

steps.headline: Follow the macho snakes.
steps.description: If you are a newbie, don't try to kill the macho snakes. Just follow them. Most of the time smaller snakes will run into the side leaving points for you to collect. Because the snake you are following is a larger snake most likely others will crowd round hoping to get a chance to attack. The snake you are following won't live long and once it dies you'll be there to pick up the scraps. Also, target the smaller snakes when you aren't a large one.

steps.headline: Play it safe to survive.
steps.description: When a snake at a higher-level dies, there will most likely be chaos. Other snakes will speed up and ram into each other.

methods.name: Sliding Towards the Edges of The Game

steps.headline: Brave the edges if you dare.
steps.description: If you've ever adventured to the end of the game, you might find some pretty big snakes sliding towards their death. You want to catch them before it's too late! If so it’s just you and a bunch of points!

steps.headline: If you don't immediately find a giant snake, poke around the area.
steps.description: There's bound to be a few snakes wandering.

steps.headline: Use the map on the lower right hand corner to your advantage.
